overview_of_class: Axiomatic approach to the real number system. Sequences of real numbers and basic properties of limits of sequences. Real-valued functions of one variable; continuity and uniform continuity. Basic properties of differentiable functions. Construction of the Riemann integral and its basic properties.
name: Real Analysis
title: WCAS MATH 320-1-71 Real Analysis
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration restricted to Undergraduate students only

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Axiomatic approach to the real number system. Sequences of real numbers and basic properties of limits of sequences. Real-valued functions of one variable; continuity and uniform continuity. Basic properties of differentiable functions. Construction of the Riemann integral and its basic properties.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: Students may not receive credit for both of 320-1 and 321-1 or for both of 320-2 and 321-2.

subject: MATH
